    If there's no Lobbies, it creates one, if there's one matching lobby but full, it creates a new one, if there's one matching Lobby which is not full the player gets added in that Lobby. it checks if UserID is free and if it's not it returns an access failed.

    • login

      public boolean login(String ID, int numplayers, boolean Gametype)
      If there's no Lobbies, it creates one, if there's one matching lobby but full, it creates a new one, if there's one matching Lobby which is not full the player gets added in that Lobby. it checks if UserID is free and if it's not it returns an access failed.
      Parameters:
      ID -
      numplayers -
      Gametype -
      Returns:
      boolean
